channel.title: Question. HELP!
channel.description:
How can i make it to where i spawn an npc but it does attack, it just stand there? I just want to see if it looks good incase i need to change the gfx and shit.
When i do ::npc #### say i do graandor. I spawn him and he attacks, how can i make it so that the npc WILL NOT attack when i spawn.
If you still do now get what I mean, some servers have pictures of all their god wars boss's and minions standing beside each other, and they aren't attacking, how can i spawn them infront of me without them attacking me?
Thanks

item.title: Question. HELP!
item.dc:creator: @Motokid126 Motokid126
